meanings.definition: An extinct language family of Northern California, consisting of the Achumawi and Atsugewi languages.
meanings.english_definition: An extinct language family of Northern California, consisting of the Achumawi and Atsugewi languages.

examples.translation: パライニハン語族はもはや話されていません。

etymology.value: From the name of the Palaihnih people, the native inhabitants of the Pit River area in California.
